title: TaskFlow
description: This website allows you as a small business to create projects and assign the tasks of the project to your team.

title: Library - Book Playlist
description: This website allows you to seacrh for a book, save a book, create libraries and add books to your created libraries.

title: Dog Date
description: Dog Date creates a way to set up a profile for you and your furry friend to find the perfect playmate. in this website you can find the nearest park, Get updated weather and send messages to other users.
topic: Google Map API, Socket.io, Open Weather API, Dog API, UI Kit

title: Current Weather and Forcast
description: Getting accurate weather is a must for every adult. Add this free weather app to your bookmark and stay updated!!

title: Work Day Schedule
description: Every professional knows that meeting milestone deadlines takes good planing. Use this tool to help you plan your daily tasks.
topic: jQuery, 3th Party API, Local Storage, HTML and CSS

title: Fun Fact Quiz
description: Test your Knowledge with this fun fact Quiz.

title: Note Taker
description: Is an application that can be used to write, save, and delete notes. This application will use express in the backend to make http calls to save and retrieve notes/data from database.

title: Burger World
description: Burger logger with MySQL, Node.js, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM (yum!).

title: Employee Directory
description: This employee directory was created using React; it allows the user to be able to filter employees by name to access to their information.
